name: Stead-Fast 2022
description:
Hello, welcome to a fast pace delivery game that will have racing around
town at high speeds delivering packages in a way that will have you
questioning your life decisions. You can smash through objects and throw
packages at houses in a way that puts FedEx to shame.
SteadFast, We will get your package there eventually!

Player Movement and truck Movement = WASD or (arrow keys);
Pick up box = ‘e’;
Drop box = ‘r’;
Switch scenes(inside wearhouse) = ‘f’;
//Otherwise Collide with stuff to interact with them

Producer = Conner V.;
Artists = Percy S. & AJ G.;
Programmers = Conner V. && Arjun A.;
Sound = Kaelen K.
